comment: Andrew Thomas: My experience with Revolut has been excellent. Their platform is user-friendly and their fees are competitive.
Sophia Lee: I've been using Revolut for over a year and have been very pleased with their service. The trading platform is reliable and customer support is excellent.
William Anderson: Revolut is okay. Not the best, not the worst. Their platform is reliable but fees are average.
Emma Thompson: I've experienced too many technical issues with Revolut and am looking for alternatives.
Jennifer Davis: I've been using Revolut for over a year and have been very pleased with their service. The trading platform is reliable and customer support is excellent.
